# es_delete_client(_:)

**Function**

Destroys and disconnects a client instance from the Endpoint Security system.

## Declaration

```swift
func es_delete_client(_ client: OpaquePointer?) -> es_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **client**: The client to destroy.

## Return Value

A value indicating whether deletion succeeded. [doc://com.apple.endpointsecurity/documentation/EndpointSecurity/ES_RETURN_ERROR] indicates that shutdown encountered an error, which results in a resource leak.
title: es_delete_client(_:)
